name: Brad Zotes
overview: Brad Zotes, a nice and robust boy, has been robbed in broad daylight on a street in his city. The two criminals, after robbing him, began to beat him until they left him in a nearby alley totally unconscious. Later, Brad, already recovered, found out the whereabouts of the thieves, and prepared to go to take revenge and recover what they had taken from him. But the criminals' mansion is full of traps and guardians, so Brad will need your help to find what he is looking for and get out of there safe and sound. In addition to the traps and dangers, the house has a sophisticated system of doors, closed of course, that prevent entry to any stranger who does not have the corresponding key.
